In this session, we explored some of the best tools for validating tabular data in R.

![](images/na-pasa-nada.PNG){fig-align="center" width="600"}

Along with Betsy Cohen we went over the **pointblank**, **data.validator**, **assertr**, and **validate** libraries, demonstrating how they can help assess data *integrity*, *accuracy*, *completness* and *consistency* quickly and efficiently.
